name: Times Travel
description:
You are in space and everything only moves, when you move. Try to destroy the planets.

This game was made in 48 hours at a local Game Jam. We swapped roles in our team. The guys who usually do art did the coding  and vice versa.

__________________________________________

Controlls: 

W, A, S, D + Mouse

__________________________________________

Team:

Hannah Kümmel (Code)

Sven Schäfer (VFX)

Lena Voß (Code)

Music by Paul Redetzky
